1.title: Welcome to uOttawa Explorer üëã
1.body: Welcome! This is the Schedule page, your hub for all upcoming events. Here you can easily find what's happening, along with their scheduled times and locations.

2.title: Explore the Map
2.body: Next, click the 'Campus Map' button in the navigation bar. This is where you'll find the interactive map to explore our beautiful campus.

3.title: Using the Interactive Map
3.body: This is the interactive map! Click on any pin to view a location, learn more about it, or use the dropdown menu to navigate directly. Track your tour progress with the bar at the top. The red circle shows your current location!

4.title: More Options & Help
4.body: Click 'More' in the navbar to change the language, find quick links to important resources, and get additional help if you need it. Enjoy your tour!
